title: Quiz  - SchemesTap 16th to 31st May
instruction: Raising and Accelerating MSME Performance” (RAMP) Scheme was announced in: Union Budget 2022-23 with an aim to improving access to market and credit, strengthening institutions and governance at the Centre and State as well as improving Centre-State linkages and partnerships. This scheme will also focus on addressing issues of delayed payments and greening of MSMEs and to scale up implementation capacity and MSME coverage in States.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the Atal Bhujal Yojana (ATAL JAL)?

A. It is being implemented in 7 states.

B. It was launched in the year 2019.

C. Department of Drinking Water and Sanitation is responsible for implementation of the yojana.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme?

A. It consists of 3-tier institutional arrangement.

B. Projects related to Major industrial wastewater collection, treatment, and recharging the same through injection can be taken up under the yojana.

C. The scheme has 2 components, Incentive component and Institutional strengthening and capacity building component.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: This scheme is being supported by the _________ on a ________ basis funding along with Govt. of India?
options: IMF, 60:40
World Bank, 40:60
ADB, 50:50
World Bank, 50:50
AIIB, 75:25

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the Design Linked Incentive (DLI) Scheme?

A. Scheme focuses on nurturing 100 domestic companies of semiconductor design.

B. Semiconductor design for Integrated Circuits (ICs), Chipsets, System on Chips (SoCs), Systems & IP Cores and semiconductor linked design, are target segments.

C. Applicants claiming incentives shall retain their domestic status for a period of 5 years after claiming incentives.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which one among the followings is the Nodal Agency of the DLI Scheme?
options: Software Technology Parks of India
India Semiconductor Mission
MeitY Startup Hub
C-DAC (Centre for Development of Advanced Computing)
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the Employees’ Pension Scheme,1995 (EPS,1995)?

A. Membership is valid till person attains age of 60 years, or avails withdrawal benefit to which he is entitled, or dies, or pension is vested in him.

B. Of the employer's share of 12 % in Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF), 8.33 % diverted towards the EPS.

C. Central Government also contribute 1.16 % of the pay of the members of Employees' Pension Scheme and credit the contribution to Employees' Pension Fund.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Pensionable salary shall be average monthly pay drawn in any manner during contributory period of service in the span of _______ preceding the date of exit from the membership of Pension Fund.
options: 12 Months
24 Months
48 Months
60 Months
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme? A. Under FAME-II scheme, the demand incentive for e-2W will be Rs. 10,000/KWh on electric two-wheelers registered on or after June 1, 2023. B. It was launched in the year 2019. C. The scheme has been extended till 2024.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Who among the following is acting as Nodal Ministry of Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles in India Phase II (FAME India II)?
options: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
Ministry of Commerce
Ministry of Heavy Industries
Ministry of Finance
None of the above

quiz.text: Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of Electric Vehicles in India Phase II (FAME India II) Scheme has been launched with a total outlay equal to Rs. ________.
options: 6000 Crore
8000 Crore
10000 Crore
12000 Crore
15000 Crore

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme?

A. Handholding and support to new FPOs up to 2 years from year of creation in all aspects will be provided.

B. It was launched in the year 2019.

C. At least 25% of the targeted FPOs would be in aspirational districts with at least one FPO in each block of aspirational districts.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: In order to ensure access to credit from Banks and Financial Institutions, a dedicated Fund of up to ____ will be created as Credit Guarantee Fund (CGF).
options: Rs. 2000 crore
Rs. 2500 crore
Rs. 1000 crore
Rs. 1,500 crore
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the Formation and Promotion of 10,000 FPOs’ scheme?

A. Cluster Based Business Organization (CBBOs) will provide initial training to Farmer Producer Organizations (FPOs).

B. Financial assistance of ₹25 lakhs per FPO is provided to CBBO.

C. Recently (May 2023) additional 1000 FPOs have been allocated to National Cooperative Development Corporation (NCDC) under FPOs’ Scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: In which year was the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph launched?
options: 2015
2017
2019
2020
2021

quiz.text: What is the proposed incentives which will be provided by the government under the scheme mentioned in above paragraph?
options: Rs. 38000 Crore
Rs. 57000 Crore
Rs. 67000 Crore
Rs. 76000 Crore
Rs. 89000 Crore

quiz.text: Which among the following are sub-schemes under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Modified Scheme for setting up of Semiconductor Fabs in India
Modified Scheme for setting up of Display Fabs in India
Design Linked Incentive (DLI) Scheme
1,2 and 3
1 and 2 Only

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme?

A. It provides not less than 100 days of unskilled manual work as a guaranteed employment in a financial year to every person in rural areas as per demand.

B. At least one-third beneficiaries shall be women.

C. Ministry of Rural Development conducts social audit to ensure accountability.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following works will be included for execution under the Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)?

A. Individual Assets for Vulnerable Sections

B. Private Works Relating to Natural Resources Management

C. Common Infrastructure for National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM) Compliant Self-Help Groups.
options: Only A
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
A and B

quiz.text: What is the minimum guaranteed unskilled wage employment in days in areas facing drought/ natural calamity?
options: 100 days
125 days
150 days
175 days
200 days

quiz.text:
Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the National Ayush Mission (NAM)?

A. Mission emphasizes the role of AYUSH in Public Health as per National Health Policy 2015.

B. Union Cabinet approved the continuation of National AYUSH Mission (NAM) from 2021 to 2026.

C. Operationalization of 12,500 Ayush Health Wellness centers (AHWCs) by constructing new Ayush Dispensaries / Health Sub-centre through State/UT Governments approved under broad umbrella of National Ayush Mission (NAM) in phased manner.
options: A and B
Only A
Only B
Only C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which among the following is not one of the flexible components of the National Ayush Mission (NAM)?
options: AYUSH Services
Yoga Wellness Centres
Sports Medicine through AYUSH
Innovations in AYUSH including Public Private Partnership
Information Education and Communication activities

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Focus is on Coldwater fisheries development and expansion of Aquaculture in Brackish Water and Saline Areas

B. Government of India provides livelihood and Nutritional support for socio-economically backward active traditional fisher’s families during fishing ban/lean period for 6 months annually.

C. Facility of Kisan Credit Card (KCC) extended to Fishers, Fish Farmers, Self Help Groups (SHGs), Joint Liability Groups, Women Groups.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the name of insurance scheme being offered as part of the Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)?
options: Fishers Accident Insurance scheme
Blue Revolution Insurance scheme
Group Accident Insurance scheme
Fisheries and allied Insurance scheme
None of the above

quiz.text: Who among the following are intended beneficiaries under the Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)? A. Ramesh, who belongs to Other Backward Classes. B. Sanjay, who is a differently abled person. C. Live life, which is a Joint Liability Group.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statement/s is/are correct with respect to the Production-Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme 2.0 for IT Hardware? A. It provides production linked incentives to boost domestic manufacturing and attract large investments in the value chain of IT Hardware products. B. 2 category of applicants - global companies and domestic companies are covered under the scheme. C. Incentives applicable under the scheme for 6 years depending upon application.
options: A and C
A and B
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What is total Financial Outlay of the Production-Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme 2.0 for IT Hardware?
options: ₹17,000 crore
₹15,000 crore
₹19,000 crore
₹18,000 crore
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which among the following are covered under target segment of Production-Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme 2.0 for IT Hardware?

A. Mobiles

B. Laptops

C. Ultra small form factor devices
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: The above-mentioned scheme is being assisted by which of the following international institutions?
options: Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank
United Nations
International Monetary Fund
World Trade Organization
World Bank

quiz.text: What is the duration of implementation for ‘Raising and Accelerating MSME Performance’ (RAMP) Scheme?
options: FY22 till 2023-24
FY22 till 2024-25
FY22 till 2025-26
FY22 till 2026-27
FY22 till 2027-28

quiz.text: RAMP scheme has a total outlay of Rs. _______, out of which Rs. 3750 crore (USD 500 Million) would be a loan from the World Bank and the remaining Rs. ______ would be funded by the Government of India (GoI).
options: Rs. 5494.23 crore (USD 732 Million), Rs. 1744.23 crore (USD 232 Million)
Rs. 6062.45 crore (USD 808 Million), Rs. 2312.45 crore (USD 308 Million)
Rs. 5625 crore (USD 750 Million), Rs. 1875 crore (USD 250 Million)
Rs. 5812.5 crore (USD 775 Million), Rs. 2062.5 crore (USD 275 Million)
Rs. 6225 crore (USD 830 million), Rs. 2475 crore (USD 330 Million)
